page.title: 17THE CHURCH, LUCKINGTON.
page.content: St.Mary and St.Ethelbert's is the local Parish Church.It was built in the 12th. Century and has had many alterations and additions,the latest being in 1872. Since then the side chapel and chancel have both been completely re-built. The present Vicar is also responsible for the churches at Alderton,Sherston, Foxley and Easton Grey.Another early part of the church is the bell tower built in the fifteenth century. The stone heads by the chancel arch are those of St.Mary and St.Ethelbert. This year a car park was built in front of the church.
